inclusion.criterion: Patients previously diagnosed with MM based on criteria from the International Myeloma Working Group (IMWG)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age 18 years at the time of signing Informed Consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A patient may have received up to 4 months of other anti myeloma therapy, as part of the induction therapy, prior enrollment and still be considered eligible to participate in the study, as long as the patient's multiple myeloma has not progressed on the current regimen and the other eligibility criteria are met.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is t(4;14) positive on screening assay.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Peripheral neuropathy of Grade 2 or greater.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with evidence of mucosal or internal bleeding and/or refractoriness to platelet transfusions (i.e., unable to maintain a platelet count 50 x 10^9 /L).
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with an absolute neutrophil count (ANC) < 1.0 x 10^9/L.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Treatment to raise the ANC, such as granulocyte colony-stimulating factor (G-CSF) or granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor (GM-CSF) is not allowed within 14 days of study entry.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with hemoglobin < 80 g/L despite transfusion.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant therapy medications that include corticosteroids (> 10 mg per day of prednisone or equivalent) or other therapy that is or may be active against myeloma prior to day 1 (with the exception of radiation therapy or induction therapy as part of the current regimen).
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She has received various treatments including melphalan, prednisone, VAD regimen, autologous stem cell transplant, thalidomide, velcade, and pamidronate.
